item.title: Rainbow magic
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:16, topic:205947”][quote author=goatee link=topic=271675.msg2237362#msg2237362 date=1211491947]

I think that looks fine as is.

Adding too much detail will just overcrowd it. Keep it simple.

… Do you even know what detail means? Detail is the small things that make it look better. Details won’t “over crowd” it. Overuse of c4ds/renders/brushing would overcrowd it.
[/quote]

Don’t be stupid. Brushing/C4ds etc are details… Adding “particles” to something which has very simple shapes and lines wouldn’t be clever. It would just ruin the idea of simplicity, I’m sure you’ve heard the phrase “Don’t over do it on the details” - well that can be applied to this. When it already looks perfectly good, why add more.

Sure he could try it, obviously the modern age, of layered graphics etc allows us to add something the mark the layer invisible if it looks shite, but I just don’t see the point, every piece of graphics work on this forum seems to be full of useless detail (apart from Fastbawlz, I like his KISS approach to his work).[/quote]

By particles I mean feathered circles… sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: Rainbow magic
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:15, topic:205947”][quote author=Greeny link=topic=271675.msg2235791#msg2235791 date=1211409813]
I think that looks fine as is.

Adding too much detail will just overcrowd it. Keep it simple.
[/quote]

… Do you even know what detail means? Detail is the small things that make it look better. Details won’t “over crowd” it. Overuse of c4ds/renders/brushing would overcrowd it.[/quote]

Don’t be stupid. Brushing/C4ds etc are details… Adding “particles” to something which has very simple shapes and lines wouldn’t be clever. It would just ruin the idea of simplicity, I’m sure you’ve heard the phrase “Don’t over do it on the details” - well that can be applied to this. When it already looks perfectly good, why add more.

Sure he could try it, obviously the modern age, of layered graphics etc allows us to add something the mark the layer invisible if it looks shite, but I just don’t see the point, every piece of graphics work on this forum seems to be full of useless detail (apart from Fastbawlz, I like his KISS approach to his work).

Read full topic

item.title: Rainbow magic
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:8, topic:205947”]http://fc08.deviantart.com/fs30/i/2008/064/2/4/Rainbow_by_SylentChaoz.jpg
Uh…is there some tutorial for this style?[/quote]

Wow that’s amazing.

spank… Why didn’t you add your own flare? You just basically took all the good stuff off. What some people don’t seem to realise is that alot of stuff on deviantart takes time… like 1 - 3 hours worth, some take days.

item.description:
@Holic wrote:

I sort of like it but I really don’t like the clouds.
I think it would look better if you were to make two different clouds instead of duplicating and flipping them.
Also the gradient on them kills them. It needs to be different then the background.
